select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.corpid, c.corpname, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from site a left join corporation c on a.corpid = c.corpid left join users u on a.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on a.updateuser = u2.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid where a.stat = 1 and siteid = $siteid$ and sitetype = '$sitetype$' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by $order_str$ , a.siteid desc
limit $skip$,$max$ ;
select count(*) from site a where a.stat = 1 and siteid != $not_siteid$ and sitetag = '$sitetag$' and sitetype = '$sitetype$' and sitename = '$sitename$' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'

select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.memo, a.corpid, c.corpname, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, a.memo, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from site a left join corporation c on a.corpid = c.corpid left join users u on a.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on a.updateuser = u2.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid where a.stat = 1 and siteid = $siteid$

select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.corpid, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, b.secid, b.secname, b.sectag, b.insertdate, b.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from section b left join site a on a.siteid = b.siteid left join users u on b.insertuser = u.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid left join users u2 on b.updateuser = u2.userid where b.stat = 1 and b.secid = $secid$ and b.siteid = $siteid$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by $order_str$ , a.siteid desc, b.secid
limit $skip$,$max$ ;
select count(*) from section b left join site a on a.siteid = b.siteid where a.stat = 1 and b.secid != $not_secid$ and b.siteid = $siteid$ and b.sectag = '$sectag$' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'

select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.corpid, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, b.secid, b.secname, b.sectag, b.memo, b.insertdate, b.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, b.updatedate, b.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from section b left join site a on a.siteid = b.siteid left join users u on b.insertuser = u.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid left join users u2 on b.updateuser = u2.userid where b.stat = 1 and b.secid = $secid$

select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.corpid, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, b.secid, b.secname, b.sectag, c.slotid, c.slotname, c.slottag, c.width, c.height, c.insertdate, c.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, c.updatedate, c.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from slot c left join section b on b.secid = c.secid left join site a on a.siteid = b.siteid left join users u on c.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on c.updateuser = u2.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid where c.stat = 1 and a.siteid = $siteid$ and c.width = $width$ and c.height = $height$ and b.secid = $secid$ and c.slotid = $slotid$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' order by $order_str$ , a.siteid desc, b.secid, c.slotid
limit $skip$,$max$ ;

select count(*) from slot c left join section b on b.secid = c.secid left join site a on b.siteid = a.siteid where c.stat = 1 and slotid != $not_slotid$ and c.siteid = $siteid$ and c.secid = $secid$ and c.slotid = $slotid$ and c.slottag = '$slottag$' $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%'

select a.sitename, a.siteid, a.sitename, sitetag, siteurl, a.corpid, a.sitetype, p.isname as sitetypename, b.secid, b.secname, b.sectag, c.memo, c.slotid, c.slotname, c.slottag, c.width, c.height, c.insertdate, c.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, c.updatedate, c.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from slot c left join section b on b.secid = c.secid left join site a on a.siteid = b.siteid left join users u on c.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on c.updateuser = u2.userid left join code_instance p on p.code = 'sitetype' and a.sitetype = p.isid where c.stat = 1 and c.slotid = $slotid$

insert into adsrv.site ( siteid, sitetype, sitetag, sitename, corpid, siteurl, memo, stat, insertdate, updatedate, insertuser, updateuser ) values ( 0, $sitetype$, '$sitetag$', '$sitename$', $corpid$, '$siteurl$', '$$', 1, '$insertdate$', '$insertdate$', $insertuser$, $insertuser$ );

sqlMap.insert: insert into adsrv.section (secid, secname, sectag, siteid, memo, stat, insertdate, updatedate, insertuser, updateuser) values (0, '$secname$', '$sectag$', $siteid$, '$memo$', 1, $insertdate$, $insertdate$, $insertuser$, $insertuser$);
sqlMap.update: update adsrv.section set secname = '$secname$', sectag = '$sectag$', siteid = $siteid$, memo = '$memo$', stat = $stat$, updatedate = $updatedate$, updateuser = $updateuser$ where secid = $secid$;

sqlMap.update: update adsrv.slot set slotname = '$slotname$', slottag = '$slottag$', width = '$width$', height = '$height$', memo = '$memo$', updatedate =$updatedate$, updateuser =$updateuser$ where slotid = $slotid$ ;

select a.groupid, a.groupname, a.width, a.height, a.insertdate, a.insertuser, u.username as insertusername, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, u2.username as updateusername from slotgroup a left join users u on a.insertuser = u.userid left join users u2 on a.updateuser = u2.userid where a.stat = 1
and a.groupid = $groupid$

select x.groupid, x.groupname, x.width, x.height, x.updatedate, x.updateuser, u.username as updateusername, count(distinct x.siteid) sitecnt, count(x.slotid) slotcnt, group_concat(concat(sitename,' ',secname, ' ', slotname) SEPARATOR '\n') as slotstr from (select STRAIGHT_JOIN a.groupid, a.groupname, a.width, a.height, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, c.secid, c.siteid, b.slotid, sitename, secname, slotname from slotgroup a left join slotgroup_slot b on b.groupid = a.groupid and b.stat = 1 left join slot c on b.slotid = c.slotid left join section d on c.secid = d.secid left join site e on d.siteid = e.siteid where a.stat = 1 and a.width = $width$ and a.height = $height$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' ) x left join users u on x.updateuser = u.userid group by x.groupid order by $order_str$ , x.groupid desc limit $skip$,$max$

select count(distinct x.groupid) from (select a.groupid, a.groupname, a.width, a.height, a.updatedate, a.updateuser, c.siteid, b.slotid, sitename, secname, slotname from slotgroup a left join slotgroup_slot b on a.groupid = b.groupid left join slot c on c.slotid = b.slotid left join section d on c.secid = d.secid left join site e on d.siteid = e.siteid where a.stat = 1 and a.groupid != $not_groupid$ and a.groupname = '$groupname$' and a.width = $width$ and a.height = $height$ $sch_column$ like '%$sch_text$%' ) x

select b.idx, c.secid, c.siteid, b.slotid, c.width, c.height, sitename, secname, slotname from slotgroup_slot b left join slot c on b.slotid = c.slotid left join section d on c.secid = d.secid left join site e on d.siteid = e.siteid where b.groupid = $groupid$ and b.stat = 1 order by b.idx
